newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - First Aviation started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - First Aviation started.

text.p: -- Dillon Read & Co Inc said on Monday analyst John Pincavage had started coverage of First Aviation Services Inc with a rating of buy.

-- "First Aviation Services is well positioned in gas turbine overhaul and repair, servicing some of the world's most widely used gas turbines with its National Airmotive subsidiary," Pincavage wrote in an analysis.

-- "The long-term target revenue and earnings growth rate for FAVS is 20 percent per year, half coming from existing businesses and half from acquisitions. Our 12-18 month target price of $16 is based on our January fiscal 1998 earnings estimate of $0.90 per share and a P/E multiple of 17, making the stock appear to be undervalued at the current price."
-- Shares in the company closed on Friday at 9-7/16.
